definitions.definition: any of the five digits at the end of the human foot.
examples: he cut his big toe on a sharp stone

definitions.definition: any of the digits of the foot of a quadruped or bird.
the part of an item of footwear that covers a person's toes.
the lower end, tip, or point of something, in particular.
the tip of the head of a golf club, furthest from the shaft.
the foot or base of a cliff, slope, or embankment.
a flattish portion at the foot of an otherwise steep curve on a graph.
a section of a rhizome or similar fleshy root from which a new plant may be propagated.
push, touch, or kick (something) with one's toe.
examples: he toed off his shoes and flexed his feet

definitions.definition: strike (the ball) with the toe of the club.
walk with the toes pointed in (or out).
examples: he toes out when he walks

definitions.definition: (of a pair of wheels) converge (or diverge) slightly at the front.
examples: on a turn, the inner wheel toes out more
